verbs.description: ham swiss egg casserole [ARG1: the buttery crunch of croissants] [V: goes] [ARGM-MNR: perfectly] [ARG2: with the smooth swiss and tender eggs] breakfast for a crew does n't get much easier than this —kathy harding richmond missouri
